match.title: 4th Match
match.statusText: Bangladesh won by 8 wickets (with 137 balls remaining)

image.caption: The redeveloped Malahide ground was hosting its first ODI
image.longCaption: The redeveloped Malahide ground was hosting its first ODI, Ireland v England, one-off ODI, Malahide, September 3, 2013

match.hoursInfo: 10.45 start, First Session 10.45-14.15 Interval 14.15-15.00, Second Session 15.00-18.30

otherSerieses.name: BDESH in ENG IRE
otherSerieses.longName: Bangladesh tour of Ireland and England

dismissalText.long: c Tamim Iqbal b Sunzamul Islam
dismissalText.commentary: Ed Joyce c Tamim Iqbal b Sunzamul Islam 46 (74b 3x4 0x6) SR: 62.16

dismissalComment.html: Joyce falls just before his fifty. Came down the pitch and tried to hit the ball over the long-on boundary. Didn't get to the pitch of the ball and it goes high in the air. Tamim settles under the ball and takes the catch

headshotImage.caption: Mustafizur Rahman player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Mustafizur Rahman player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.long: c Tamim Iqbal b Mustafizur Rahman
dismissalText.commentary: Niall O'Brien c Tamim Iqbal b Mustafizur Rahman 30 (42b 1x4 1x6) SR: 71.42

dismissalComment.html: its wide of off-stump and O'Brien throws the bat at the ball, it flies in the air and its straight to Tamim at third man. Simple catch, easily taken.

headshotImage.caption: Mustafizur Rahman player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Mustafizur Rahman player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: its wide outside off-stump and Stirling edges the ball to short third man. Dangerous Stirling is gone for a duck!
its wide of off-stump and O'Brien throws the bat at the ball, it flies in the air and its straight to Tamim at third man. Simple catch, easily taken.
What a catch! Its hit high in the air towards the cover boundary. Mosaddek comes charging off the cover boundary and dives full length to take the catch. Out of this world fielding

not looking likely here. Its a short ball down the legside and Wilson looks to hook the ball. Noise down the legside and he is given out. Looks like it might have been his hip not the bat. Doesn't matter, he is still gone.
Dockrell swings at a ball outside off-stump and gets an edge through to the keeper. Its a regulation catch and Rahim throws the ball high in the air, Dockrell's shoulders slump as he walks off
its another great catch from Rahim. Chase gets an edge to a ball outside off-stump and Rahim flies to his left and takes an diving catch inches off the ground.

dismissalComment.html: its wide outside off-stump and Stirling edges the ball to short third man. Dangerous Stirling is gone for a duck!

dismissalText.commentary: William Porterfield c & b Mosaddek Hossain 22 (25b 3x4 1x6) SR: 88

dismissalComment.html: looks like the dropped catch isn't going to matter. Its chipped back to the bowler and he gets down to take a simple catch

dismissalText.commentary: Andy Balbirnie b Shakib Al Hasan 12 (24b 0x4 1x6) SR: 50

dismissalComment.html: ball goes straight on with the arm and Balbirnie plays down the wrong line and is bowled. Terrific start for Bangladesh this morning

dismissalText.commentary: Kevin O'Brien c Mosaddek Hossain b Mustafizur Rahman 10 (11b 1x4 0x6) SR: 90.9

dismissalComment.html: What a catch! Its hit high in the air towards the cover boundary. Mosaddek comes charging off the cover boundary and dives full length to take the catch. Out of this world fielding

headshotImage.caption: Mustafizur Rahman player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Mustafizur Rahman player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Gary Wilson c †Mushfiqur Rahim b Mustafizur Rahman 6 (17b 0x4 0x6) SR: 35.29

dismissalComment.html: not looking likely here. Its a short ball down the legside and Wilson looks to hook the ball. Noise down the legside and he is given out. Looks like it might have been his hip not the bat. Doesn't matter, he is still gone.

headshotImage.caption: Barry McCarthy player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Barry McCarthy player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Barry McCarthy player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Barry McCarthy player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Barry McCarthy lbw b Sunzamul Islam 12 (23b 1x4 0x6) SR: 52.17

dismissalComment.html: McCarthy goes down on one knee and looks to sweep the ball, gets hit on the pad and the appeal goes up. The Umpire thinks for a couple of seconds and the finger goes up

dismissalText.commentary: George Dockrell c †Mushfiqur Rahim b Mashrafe Mortaza 25 (50b 1x4 0x6) SR: 50

dismissalComment.html: Dockrell swings at a ball outside off-stump and gets an edge through to the keeper. Its a regulation catch and Rahim throws the ball high in the air, Dockrell's shoulders slump as he walks off

dismissalText.commentary: Peter Chase c †Mushfiqur Rahim b Mashrafe Mortaza 0 (1b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0

dismissalComment.html: its another great catch from Rahim. Chase gets an edge to a ball outside off-stump and Rahim flies to his left and takes an diving catch inches off the ground.

dismissalText.commentary: Soumya Sarkar not out 87 (68b 11x4 2x6) SR: 127.94
Tamim Iqbal c †NJ O'Brien b KJ O'Brien 47 (54b 6x4 0x6) SR: 87.03

dismissalComment.html: first wicket goes down, its a good length ball and Tamim plays back to the ball. Gets a thin edge and it goes through to the keeper. Appeal goes up and the Umpire takes his time before raising the finger.

first wicket goes down, its a good length ball and Tamim plays back to the ball. Gets a thin edge and it goes through to the keeper. Appeal goes up and the Umpire takes his time before raising the finger.

headshotImage.caption: Barry McCarthy player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Barry McCarthy player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: Sabbir was going for everything and pulls another short ball into the legside. Didn't get fully under it and Dockrell takes the catch on the square leg boundary

dismissalText.commentary: Tamim Iqbal c †NJ O'Brien b KJ O'Brien 47 (54b 6x4 0x6) SR: 87.03

dismissalComment.html: first wicket goes down, its a good length ball and Tamim plays back to the ball. Gets a thin edge and it goes through to the keeper. Appeal goes up and the Umpire takes his time before raising the finger.

headshotImage.caption: Barry McCarthy player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Barry McCarthy player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Sabbir Rahman c Dockrell b McCarthy 35 (34b 3x4 1x6) SR: 102.94

dismissalComment.html: Sabbir was going for everything and pulls another short ball into the legside. Didn't get fully under it and Dockrell takes the catch on the square leg boundary

headshotImage.caption: Mustafizur Rahman player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Mustafizur Rahman player page headshot cutout, 2021

commentTextItems.html: clips the ball off the pads to long leg and Bangladesh win at a canter!

commentPostTextItems.html: We have seen a comprehensive win here today from Bangladesh, they outplayed Ireland for the first ball.
With such a low target to defend, Ireland needed early wickets and never got them. Both Tamim and Sarkar played positively from the go and never stopped.
Sarkar took a while to get going and then went through the gears to finish on a very impressive 87 off 68 balls.
None of the Ireland bowlers managed to create any pressure and they look very disspirted side at the moment, gets that what you get after losing so many games in a row.

Presentations have just been completed and Mustafizur has just been named as man of the match for his excellent bowling in the Ireland innings. Must have been a close run thing after Souyma Sarkar's batting
So Bangladesh collect four points and move into second place in the tri-series table.
Only 2 days until we meet again when New Zealand play Ireland here at Malahide.
That just leaves me to thank you for following my commentary today, hopefully you will be back with us on Sunday. Till then this is Justin Smyth saying bye.

commentTextItems.html: comes round the wicket and its another short ball, ramps it over the slips and third man can't cut it off. Scores are tied

headshotImage.caption: Barry McCarthy player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Barry McCarthy player page headshot cutout, 2021

commentTextItems.html: goes short again and Sarkar pulls the ball, doesn't time it well and its stopped by Balbirnie at mid-wicket
clips the ball past short mid-wicket, its a long chase back for Balbirnie
cuts the ball down through backward point, Porterfield dives to his left and can't stop the ball. O'Brien tidies up
cuts the ball towards point, goes into the ground and Porterfield takes the ball at head height
waits for the short ball and ramps it down to third man, down to 8 needed now
goes short and the balls pulled out to the square leg boundary, Dockrell runs forward and picks up the ball

headshotImage.caption: Barry McCarthy player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Barry McCarthy player page headshot cutout, 2021

commentTextItems.html: comes down the pitch and cuts the ball out to point, Porterfield mis-fields and they decide against the run
lets the ball run off the face of the bat down to third man
outside off-stump and left alone again
outside off-stump and Rahim gets his bat well out of the way, bounces again before it gets through to the keeper
gets in line and defends the ball back down the pitch

dismissalText.commentary: Sabbir Rahman c Dockrell b McCarthy 35 (34b 3x4 1x6) SR: 102.94

commentTextItems.html: Sabbir was going for everything and pulls another short ball into the legside. Didn't get fully under it and Dockrell takes the catch on the square leg boundary

commentPostTextItems.html: The batsman crossed so Rahim is on strike
10 runs to go and O'Brien comes back on.

headshotImage.caption: Barry McCarthy player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Barry McCarthy player page headshot cutout, 2021

commentTextItems.html: this is ending very quickly here. It flies off the bat as it races through extra cover
another short ball againn from the bowler, not as high this time and its pulled out to Joyce on the square leg boundary
lovely shot from Sarkar, McCarthy goes for another short ball. Lifts the bat up and ramps the ball over the keepers head.
goes short and the ball gets pulled down to long leg, another run gets chalked off
gets a thick edge down to third man
the straightest of straight sixes. Its a good length ball, Sabbir leans back and hits it high over the bowlers head. Goes well over the boundary

headshotImage.caption: Barry McCarthy player page headshot cutout, 2021

milestones.description: This is the lowest match aggregate (363) involving teams Bangladesh & Ireland in ODIs

stories.title: Mustafizur, Sarkar hand Ireland a drubbing
stories.subTitle: Ireland v Bangladesh, Tri-nation series, Malahide
stories.seoTitle: Mustafizur Rahman, Soumya Sarkar hand Ireland a drubbing
stories.summary: Mustafizur Rahman sliced through Ireland's middle order to pick up four wickets and set up Bangladesh's eight-wicket win

image.caption: Mustafizur Rahman took the wicket of Paul Stirling in the second over
image.longCaption: Mustafizur Rahman took the wicket of Paul Stirling in the second over, Ireland v Bangladesh, Tri-nation series, Malahide, May 19, 2017

stories.title: Rain a worry as Ireland, Bangladesh chase first wins
stories.subTitle: Ireland v Bangladesh, Tri-nation series, Malahide
stories.seoTitle: Rain a worry as Ireland, Bangladesh chase first wins
stories.summary: Ireland have slid considerably over the last year or so, while Bangladesh have just one win from their last five ODIs, leaving both teams desperate for a win

image.caption: Tamim Iqbal celebrates his eighth ODI century
image.longCaption: Tamim Iqbal celebrates his eighth ODI century, Sri Lanka v Bangladesh, 1st ODI, Dambulla, March 25, 2017
